26 bool SingleJoint2dUpdater::update(Robot *h, const Eigen::Affine3d &base, const std::map<std::string, Eigen::Affine3d> &joints, const HumanSettings &settings)
27 {
28  RobotState q(h);
29  bool ok=computeConf(h,base,joints,settings,q);
30  h->setAndUpdate(q);
31  return ok;
32 }

34 bool SingleJoint2dUpdater::computeConf(Robot *h, const Eigen::Affine3d &base, const std::map<std::string, Eigen::Affine3d> &joints, const HumanSettings &settings, RobotState &q)
35 {
36  bool ok=true;
37  q = *h->getCurrentPos();
38  std::string torsojoint = "base_torso";
39  if(h->getHriAgent()->type==HRI_HERAKLES){
40  torsojoint="Pelvis";
41  }
42  for(uint i=0;i<3;i++){
43  q[i+6]=base.translation()[i];
44  }
45  Eigen::Vector3d rotations = base.rotation().eulerAngles(0,1,2);
46  for(uint i=0;i<3;i++){
47  q[i+3+6]=rotations[i];
48  }
49  Joint *torso=h->getJoint(torsojoint);
50  if(torso){
51  uint index=torso->getIndexOfFirstDof();
52  float height;
53  if(settings.getData("height",height))
54  q[index+2]=height;
55  else{
56  ROS_WARN("No height specified for human %s, needed by SingleJoint2dUpdater human manager plugin",h->getName().c_str());
57  ok=false;
58  }
59  }else{
60  ROS_WARN("No joint named %s in human model %s",torsojoint.c_str(),h->getName().c_str());
61  ok=false;
62  }
63  return ok;
64 }
